FuncDef: The display vendor-class dhcpv6 command displays information about the vendor-class dhcpv6 configuration in the system view.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the terminal does not carry the vendor-class information using DHCPv6 Option16, you can run the vendor-class dhcpv6 command to configure the mapping between vendor-class and DHCPv6 option.
After the configuration is complete, you can run the display vendor-class dhcpv6 command to check the configuration.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
